de: Willkommen im EDEN HOTEL in Sainte-Maxime, das sich im Herzen der legendären Bucht von Saint-Tropez befindet. Das 4-Sterne-Hotel EDEN HÔTEL ist nur wenige Schritte vom Meer entfernt und von einem üppigen mediterranen Garten mit Privatpool umgeben.
en:
Welcome to EDEN HOTEL, in Sainte-Maxime, located in the heart of the mythical bay of Saint-Tropez. A stone’s throw from the sea, EDEN HOTEL, 4 stars (under acquisition), is surrounded by a lush Mediterranean garden with its private pool. 

Experience a memorable stay in a warm and elegant hotel, a stone’s throw from the sea. 

You prefer to swim in the crystal clear waters of the Mediterranean? Cross to live the EDEN PLAGE experience: our team is waiting for you!

OUR ROOMS
The alliance of blond wood, punctuated with touches of metal and marble, silky fabrics and clean lines, bring to our 16 rooms and suite a timeless, resolutely elegant tone.
Stretching over 20 to 40 square metres, the rooms are set in a wild setting and open onto spacious terraces that offer views of the Mediterranean and the hills of the Gulf of Saint-Tropez.

FILL UP ON VITAMINS
With us, breakfast is a special moment. Whether for small or large appetites, those in a hurry or those who like to take their time, our hoteliers offer a rich and varied breakfast. Young and old alike will find their happiness with a choice of balanced, homemade or regional products. On a business trip, as a couple or with your family, treat yourself to pleasure in the morning and don’t resist your cravings for food.

A WARM EXPERIENCE
Attentive to all your wishes, our team is at your disposal to make your stay a warm and cozy experience. The reception is open 24h/24 and 7d/7, with valet service and baggage handler. Several rooms are equipped for people with reduced mobility.

A moment of WELL-BEING & RELAXATION
Eden Hotel offers you an ideal setting for a small enchanted parenthesis with a sublime panoramic view of the Gulf of Saint-Tropez. To break with a hectic daily life, to suspend the course of time, to renew oneself in order to reach a universe of fullness, such is the ambition of Eden Hotel. Sunbathe in the tranquility of the hotel on the edge of our beautiful heated swimming pool with submerged beach on roller shutters and do some lengths facing the sea.

Comfort: Canal +
it: Benvenuti all'EDEN HÔTEL, a Sainte-Maxime, nel cuore della mitica baia di Saint-Tropez. A pochi passi dal mare, l'EDEN HÔTEL 4 stelle è circondato da un lussureggiante giardino mediterraneo con piscina privata.
fr: Bienvenue à EDEN HÔTEL, à Sainte-Maxime, situé en plein cœur de la baie mythique de Saint-Tropez. À deux pas de la mer, EDEN HÔTEL 4 étoiles, est entouré d’un luxuriant jardin méditerranéen avec sa piscine privée.
nl: Welkom bij EDEN HÔTEL, in Sainte-Maxime, gelegen in het hart van de mythische baai van Saint-Tropez. EDEN HÔTEL 4 sterren ligt op een steenworp afstand van de zee en is omgeven door een weelderige mediterrane tuin met een privézwembad.
es: Bienvenido al EDEN HÔTEL, en Sainte-Maxime, situado en el corazón de la mítica bahía de Saint-Tropez. A un paso del mar, el EDEN HÔTEL 4 estrellas está rodeado de un exuberante jardín mediterráneo con su piscina privada.

hasBeenCreatedBy.schema:legalName: Office de tourisme de Sainte Maxime

hasBeenPublishedBy.schema:legalName: Office de tourisme de Sainte Maxime - source : Apidae Tourisme
